Text: Thanks very much for sharing. It's worth noting that Ditko also drew Captain Atom #78-89, so this is the first 1/2 of his C.A. work. Also, his unpublished #90 was published in Charlton Bullseye years later.

Thanks for that! I should have checked that on wiki.

if you ever find those issues give me a link please!  Another series of Ditko's I would love to have is Mr. A, but I found no scans whatsoever as of yet.

You can grab them all from this:
http://thepiratebay.sx/torrent/6477827/

It also has complete runs of Captain Marvel Adventures and Captain Marvel Jr.

I'll be on the lookout for Mr. A
Strange Suspense 75 is mostly empty and one of the three image files in the container is corrupted...
I will take care of it, I didn't know there were corrupted files.....
OK, I got the correct #75 into the torrent, and I recheck every other file and there was no corruption on my end, can I suggest downloading it again?

Not sure what you're lookin' at...
Strange_Suspense_Stories_075.cbr is a 1.7mb rar container with 3 images, the last of which is corrupted.  Why don't you try checking this issue and up'ing it separately.

DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS ANYMORE!  I found the problem, fixed it, and reuploaded the new torrent here:

http://thepiratebay.sx/torrent/8078554/Captain_Atom_Ditko_fixed_files_and_added_some_stuff_

Sorry about that people, had to fix the issue and work for a living!
